languages.text: "Я стал чем-то слишком большим и страшным, чтобы ты мог это представить. Но это не значит, что ты был обманут. Моя личность жива, как и мои симпатии к Глейто. И не только к нему".

traits.locale_text: "Я стал чем-то слишком большим и страшным, чтобы ты мог это представить. Но это не значит, что ты был обманут. Моя личность жива, как и мои симпатии к Глейто. И не только к нему".

languages.text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."
languages.original_text: "Я стал чем-то слишком большим и страшным, чтобы ты мог это представить. Но это не значит, что ты был обманут. Моя личность жива, как и мои симпатии к Глейто. И не только к нему".

traits.locale_text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

"I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

"I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

"I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

"I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

"I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

languages.text: 「自分は、あなたの理解を超えた、偉大でおそろしい何かへと変貌を遂げた。だが、それはあなたが欺かれていたということではない。自分の人格は今も生きている。グライトへの共感も。そして共感したのは彼だけにではない」
languages.original_text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

traits.locale_text: 「自分は、あなたの理解を超えた、偉大でおそろしい何かへと変貌を遂げた。だが、それはあなたが欺かれていたということではない。自分の人格は今も生きている。グライトへの共感も。そして共感したのは彼だけにではない」

languages.text: "Ich bin etwas zu Großes und Furchterregendes geworden, als dass Ihr mich noch verstehen könntet. Das heißt aber nicht, dass Ihr getäuscht wurdet. Meine Persönlichkeit lebt weiter, genau wie meine Zuneigung zu Glaito. Und nicht nur zu ihm."
languages.original_text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin etwas zu Großes und Furchterregendes geworden, als dass Ihr mich noch verstehen könntet. Das heißt aber nicht, dass Ihr getäuscht wurdet. Meine Persönlichkeit lebt weiter, genau wie meine Zuneigung zu Glaito. Und nicht nur zu ihm."

languages.text: « Je suis devenu quelque chose de trop grand et de trop effrayant pour que vous puissiez le comprendre, mais cela ne signifie pas que je vous ai trompé. Ma personnalité perdure, tout comme ma sympathie pour Glaito. Et pas seulement pour lui. »
languages.original_text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis devenu quelque chose de trop grand et de trop effrayant pour que vous puissiez le comprendre, mais cela ne signifie pas que je vous ai trompé. Ma personnalité perdure, tout comme ma sympathie pour Glaito. Et pas seulement pour lui. »

languages.text: «Ahora soy algo demasiado grande y aterrador para su comprensión. Pero eso no significa que deba sentirse engañado. Mi personalidad aún perdura, como también mi simpatía por Glaito. Y no solo por él».
languages.original_text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora soy algo demasiado grande y aterrador para su comprensión. Pero eso no significa que deba sentirse engañado. Mi personalidad aún perdura, como también mi simpatía por Glaito. Y no solo por él».

languages.text: “我的体内发生了巨大的变化，已经超出了你的理解。不过，这并不意味着我欺骗了你。我的人格会始终存续下去，我对格雷托的同情也同样如此。而且，我同情的并不仅仅只有格雷托。”
languages.original_text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

traits.locale_text: “我的体内发生了巨大的变化，已经超出了你的理解。不过，这并不意味着我欺骗了你。我的人格会始终存续下去，我对格雷托的同情也同样如此。而且，我同情的并不仅仅只有格雷托。”

languages.text: "İdrak edilemeyecek kadar muazzam ve korkutucu birine dönüştüysem de bu seni yanıltmasın. Kişiliğim ve hem Glaito'ya hem diğer herkese duyduğum hisler hâlâ aynı."
languages.original_text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."

traits.locale_text: "İdrak edilemeyecek kadar muazzam ve korkutucu birine dönüştüysem de bu, seni yanıltmasın. Kişiliğim ve hem Glaito'ya hem diğer herkese olan hislerim aynı."

languages.original_text: "I have become something too great and frightening for your understanding. But that does not mean that you were deceived. My personality lives on, as does my sympathy for Glaito. And not just for him."
